overview: Daniel Gizaw is an expert in electromechanical systems and power electronics and successful leader with over 20 years experience designing state-of-the-art electric motors, generators and digital drives. Dan has worked prior to Danotek as key researcher and leader on breakthrough technology products while with General Electric, GM Electric Vehicle program, Cummins Power Generation and Ford Motor Company. Dan holds an MSEE from the University of Gdansk and has taken PhD courses at the University of Wisconsin
